headerText:
The jumbotron is a flexible call to action component. Supports background images, gradient overlays and much more.

Jumbotrons have been deprecated since v1.2, it is recommended that you use [v-img](/components/images), [v-responsive](/layout/aspect-ratios), or a plain div instead.

gradient.desc: More information on writing gradients can be found [here](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/linear-gradient)

gradientWithImage.desc: More information on writing gradients can be found [here](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/linear-gradient)

props.gradient: Apply a gradient background. If used with the **src** prop, will overlay it
